title: Casa Axis Mundi
description: Raw and vegan B&B and retreat centre offering a beautiful place to relax and retreat in a tropical garden with pool. Provides health therapies and opportunity for cleansing and healing retreats, short and long term. The healthy high carb, low fat, raw vegan breakfast consists of juices, smoothies, whole and prepared fruit. Daily changing 4-course dinner meals are also served on request. English and German spoken.
